meanings.definition: A type of ancient Greek drinking vessel in the shape of an animal's head.
meanings.sent1: The rhyta was used for drinking in ancient Greece.
meanings.sent2: At the museum, I saw many rhyta displayed.
meanings.sent3: The rhyta at the party looked like funny animal faces.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of rhyta was a zoo of drinking cups.
meanings.sent5: The shiny rhyta gleamed on the shelf, tempting guests to use them.

meanings.definition: The plural form of 'rhyton', a type of ancient Greek drinking vessel.
meanings.sent1: The archaeologists found many rhyta buried in the ruins.
meanings.sent2: In the ancient market, merchants sold various rhyta.
meanings.sent3: The rhyta on the shelf clinked together like musical instruments.
meanings.sent4: The rhyta in the collection were like trophies from a forgotten time.
meanings.sent5: The colorful rhyta added a touch of history to the room.
